title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 65.30 - Mistakes, omissions, defects and irregularities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 65.30 - Mistakes, omissions, defects and irregularities

State Regulations

At any state of a proceeding the Board may permit a
mistake, omission, defect, or irregularity to be corrected, upon such terms as
may be just, or if a substantial right of a party is not prejudiced, the
mistake, omission, defect, or irregularity may be
disregarded. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
65.30

Adopted

New

York State Register March 30, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 13, eff. 3/30/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
